data.title: Wrymouth" PIAST, Prince of Poland
data.text:
The Chronic√¶ Polanorum names "Bolezlavum" as son of King Wladyslaw and his wife "filiam Wratislavi Bohemici regis". The Annales Capituli Cracoviensis record the birth in 1086 of "Bolezlaus tertius" followed immediately by the death of "Iudith mater sua".

He succeeded his father in 1102 as BOLESLAW III "Krzywousty/Wrymouth" Prince of Poland. The Annales Cracovienses Compilati record that "Boleslaus duos Pomeranos duces devicit aput Nakel. Iste tercius Boleslaus terras obtinuit". Duke of Pomerania 1122-1138. Before his death Boleslaw III arranged a division of his lands among his sons.
